metadata.title: CVE-2019-12815 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An arbitrary file copy vulnerability in mod_copy in ProFTPD up to 1.3.5ballows for remote code execution and information disclosure withoutauthentication, a related issue to CVE-2015-3306.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
